recommendations: Arshaq Ahmed “Himanshu and I worked together at Newton School as a part of the Core Sales team. He always lead from the front with an example of an exemplary leader and had always a cheerful attitude no matter what. His ability to work through pressure situations and come up with solutions to achieve the targets was really inspiring. I would say a fabulous colleague and a great friend I met at Newton. Thanks for all your guidance and support, Himanshu! Wishing you the best.”
